name: Love Story Games: Teenage Drama
summary:
Love Story Games: Teenage Drama is an interactive story where you have to guide your character through her day to day life, where she'll find love thanks to your advice. Enjoy this fun teenage adventure where drama and amorous tragedy are the order of the day.

In this adventure you discover your personality by making decisions that will change your life in dozens of essential ways, turning you into one person or another and unfolding very different key paths based on your choices. Each small step you take will influence your feelings and you never know where you'll find love. You might fall for the hottest boy in your class who then rejects you or have to have a secret relationship you hide from all your friends. Think about how you feel and make the right decision based on your ideas.

Pick your own style in this adventure and start to discover all the future holds for you in your high school, family, friends, couples... everything that happens in Love Story Games: Teenage Drama can lead you in one direction or another. Recall that only your personality and your decisions will take you from one place to another, but you can start the adventure over again as often as you like, discovering what's happened in your life should you opt for a different path in a certain place. Move through the different life stages and discover the new world that opens in front of you in this fun graphic adventure.
